channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

item.title: Manhattanhenge Is Back for 2025: When, Where and How to Watch
item.description: It is time once again to head to your nearest crosstown view for New York City’s best annual sunsets, if the weather cooperates.

item.title: Joël Le Scouarnec, French Doctor Who Molested Hundreds of Children, Is Sentenced
item.description: A former surgeon had confessed to abusing at least 299 people, mostly children, in what is considered the largest case of its kind in French history.
